product_name: AhavapRetinol Serum for Smoothing & Fine Lines
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganThis lightweight Serum is based on AHAVA's exclusive pRetinol patent which supplies the skin with Retinol precursors that the skin converts into Retinol. It is a 'natural-to-skin' safe alternative to Retinol, tailor-made for your skin with all of the benefits and none of the side effects.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine linesRefines the skin's texture and toneImproves luminosityFormulated WithoutAlcoholGMOsParabensItem 2606021How To UseApply 2-3 pumps on cleansed face and neck day and night. Follow with moisturizer.IngredientsAqua (Mineral Spring Water), Squalene (Phytosqualene), Glycerin, Propanediol (Corn Derived), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Cyclopentasiloxane, C15-19 Alkane, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Saccharide Isomerate, Propylene Carbonate, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Parfum (Fragrance), Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Corn Starch Modified, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Red 40 (Ci 16035), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Evodia Rutaecarpa Fruit Extract, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe-Vera) Leaf Juice, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Phoenix Dactylifera (Date) Fruit Extract, Niacinamide, Beta-Carotene, Dunaliella Salina (Dead Sea Alga) Extract, Maris Aqua (Dead Sea Water/Osmoter).
how_to_use: Apply 2-3 pumps on cleansed face and neck day and night. Follow with moisturizer.
